Package core

Class StandardStation

java.lang.Object
core.StandardStation
All Implemented Interfaces:
DockingStation
public class StandardStation extends Object implements DockingStation
Standard station implementation : handle picking a bike and returning a bike Composed of an array of parking

    • pickBike

      public void pickBike(int parkingSlot, User user)

      Pick a bike from a station

      Remove the bike from the parking of the parkingSlot of the docking station and set it to the user.

      Beware !

      If there is no bike in the parking at parkingSlot, the function will do nothing.
      Specified by:
      pickBike in interface DockingStation
      Parameters:
      parkingSlot - The number of the parking slot in the station.
      user - The user that is picking a bike. Example : User user = new User("Alice"); DockingStation station = new StandardStation(4, new GPS(0.,0.)); for (Parking park : station) { if (Math.random()<=0.7) { if (Math.random()<=0.3) { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Electrical") ); } else { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Mechanical") ); } } station.pickBike(0,user); Here the user picked the bike at the parking slot 0.

    • pickBike

      public void pickBike(User user, String bikeType)

      Pick a bike from a station

      Remove the bike from the parking of the type asked by the user of the docking station and set it to the user.

      Beware !

      If there is no bike of the bikeType in the station, the function will do nothing.
      Specified by:
      pickBike in interface DockingStation
      Parameters:
      bikeType - The number of the parking slot in the station.
      user - Example : User user = new User("Alice"); DockingStation station = new StandardStation(4, new GPS(0.,0.)); for (Parking park : station) { if (Math.random()<=0.7) { if (Math.random()<=0.3) { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Electrical") ); } else { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Mechanical") ); } } station.pickBike(user,"Electrical"); Here the user picked an electrical bike at the station.

    • getListSlots

      Specified by:
      getListSlots in interface DockingStation

    • dropBike

      public void dropBike(int parkingSlot, User user)

      Drop a bike at a station

      Automatically find an empty place to drop the bike, set the bike in the first free parking, remove the bike from the user.

      Beware !

      If the parking is not empty, the function will do nothing.
      Specified by:
      dropBike in interface DockingStation
      Parameters:
      parkingSlot - The number of the parking slot in the station.
      user - The user that is dropping the bike. Example : User user = new User("Alice"); DockingStation station = new StandardStation(4, new GPS(0.,0.)); for (Parking park : station) { if (Math.random()<=0.7) { if (Math.random()<=0.3) { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Electrical") ); } else { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Mechanical") ); } } station.pickBike(0,user); station.dropBike(0,user); Here the user dropped the bike at the parkingSlot 0 of the station.

    • dropBike

      public void dropBike(User user)

      Drop a bike at a station

      Automatically find an empty place to drop the bike, set the bike in the first free parking, remove the bike from the user.

      Beware !

      If the parking is full, the function will do nothing.
      Specified by:
      dropBike in interface DockingStation
      Parameters:
      user - The user that is dropping the bike. Example : User user = new User("Alice"); DockingStation station = new StandardStation(4, new GPS(0.,0.)); for (Parking park : station) { if (Math.random()<=0.7) { if (Math.random()<=0.3) { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Electrical") ); } else { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Mechanical") ); } } station.pickBike(user, "Mechanical"); station.dropBike(user); Here the user dropped the bike at the parkingSlot 0 of the station.

    • countFreePlaces

      public int countFreePlaces()

      Count the number of free places in a station

      Return the number of freePlaces in the station Example : User user = new User("Alice"); DockingStation station = new StandardStation(4, new GPS(0.,0.)); for (Parking park : station) { if (Math.random()<=0.7) { if (Math.random()<=0.3) { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Electrical") ); } else { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Mechanical") ); } } station.countFreePlaces();
      Specified by:
      countFreePlaces in interface DockingStation

    • hasBikeType

      public boolean hasBikeType(String bikeType)

      Does the station have the biketype asked by the user ?

      Return true if the station has the biketype asked by the user, else return false
      Specified by:
      hasBikeType in interface DockingStation
      Parameters:
      bikeType - if the station has this biketype : currently should be "Electrical" or "Mechanical" Example : User user = new User("Alice"); DockingStation station = new StandardStation(4, new GPS(0.,0.)); for (Parking park : station) { if (Math.random()<=0.7) { if (Math.random()<=0.3) { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Electrical") ); } else { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Mechanical") ); } } station.hasBikeType("Mechanical");

    • WhereBikeType

      public int WhereBikeType(String bikeType)

      Return the index of the parking where the biketype is in the station

      Return the index of the parking where the biketype is in the station. Return 0 if the bikeType is not in the station.
      Parameters:
      bikeType - if the station has this biketype : currently should be "Electrical" or "Mechanical" Example : User user = new User("Alice"); DockingStation station = new StandardStation(4, new GPS(0.,0.)); for (Parking park : station) { if (Math.random()<=0.7) { if (Math.random()<=0.3) { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Electrical") ); } else { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Mechanical") ); } } station.WhereBikeType("Mechanical");

    • getFreeParking

      public Parking getFreeParking()

      Get the first free parking of the station

      Return the first free parking of the station, if there is no free parking return null. Example : DockingStation station = new StandardStation(4, new GPS(0.,0.)); for (Parking park : station) { if (Math.random()<=0.7) { if (Math.random()<=0.3) { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Electrical") ); } else { park.setCurrentBicycle(bicycleFactory.getBicycle("Mechanical") ); } } station.getFreeParking();
